    • Create the provider and sets the following parameters has mandatory * oauth_consumer_key * oauth_token * oauth_signature_method * oauth_signature * oauth_timestamp * oauth_nonce * oauth_verifier

    • Add a parameter to the list of required parameters.

    • Add a signature method to this provider
      add_signature_method()
    • Call the consumer_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK Your callback method __HAS TO__ set $provider->consumer_secret to the right value or the signature will fail
      call_consumer_handler()
    • Call the token_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK
      call_nonce_handler()
    • Call the token_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK
      call_timestamp_handler()
    • Call the token_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK
      call_token_handler()
    • Check if the request is valid This check for: - valid consumer (key/secret) - valid token (key/secret) if bypassTokenCheck is not set to true - valid timestamp threshold - valid nonce
      check_oauth_request()
    • Set the consumer callback
      consumer_handler()
    • Generates a random string
      generate_token()
    • Set the is_request_token flag This will bypass the token check (token_handler won't be call)
      is_request_token()

    • Remove parameters from the required parameters list.

    • Remove a signature method from this provider
      remove_signature_method()
    • Call this function before the check_oauth_request when you want to grant a request token Basically it disabled the token_handler check and force the oauth_callback parameter This unset the following required parameters: * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER and set the following ones * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CALLBACK It also sets is_request_token to true, i.e token_handler won't be called
      set_request_token_query()
    • Set the provider to accept OAuth query for access token This unset the following required parameters: * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_USERNAME_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_PASSWORD_KEY and set the following ones * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE_METHOD * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TIMESTAMP * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_NONCE * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER
      set_to_oauth_flow()
    • Set the provider to accept xAuth query for access token This unset the following required parameters: * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CALLBACK and set the following ones * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_USERNAME_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_PASSWORD_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_MODE * * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE_METHOD * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TIMESTAMP * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_NONCE
      set_to_xauth_flow()

    User: zeflasher Date: 25/06/12 Time: 7:47 PM

     Methods

    Create the provider and sets the following parameters has mandatory * oauth_consumer_key * oauth_token * oauth_signature_method * oauth_signature * oauth_timestamp * oauth_nonce * oauth_verifier

    __construct() 

    Add a parameter to the list of required parameters.

    add_required_parameter(string $parameter_name) 

    An error will be thrown if the OAuthRequest does not have all of those. By default the required parameters are: - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE_METHOD - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TIMESTAMP - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_NONCE - OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER needed for a normal call passing an access token

    Parameters

    $parameter_name

    string

    Add a signature method to this provider

    add_signature_method(\Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthSignatureMethod $signature_method) 

    Parameters

    $signature_method

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthSignatureMethod

    Call the consumer_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK Your callback method __HAS TO__ set $provider->consumer_secret to the right value or the signature will fail

    call_consumer_handler() 

    Exceptions

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthException

    Call the token_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK

    call_nonce_handler() 

    Exceptions

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthException

    Call the token_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK

    call_timestamp_handler() 

    Exceptions

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthException

    Call the token_handler callback and throw an exception if result of the callback is not \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthConstants::OAUTH_OK

    call_token_handler() 

    Exceptions

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthException

    Check if the request is valid This check for: - valid consumer (key/secret) - valid token (key/secret) if bypassTokenCheck is not set to true - valid timestamp threshold - valid nonce

    check_oauth_request() 

    Exceptions

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthException

    Set the consumer callback

    consumer_handler(callback $callback_function) 

    Parameters

    $callback_function

    callback

    Generates a random string

    generate_token(int $length, bool $strong) : string

    static

    Parameters

    $length

    int

    The desired token length, in terms of bytes.

    $strong

    bool

    Setting to TRUE means /dev/random will be used for entropy, as otherwise the non-blocking /dev/urandom is used. This parameter is ignored on Windows.

    Returns

    string

    Set the is_request_token flag This will bypass the token check (token_handler won't be call)

    is_request_token($bypass_token_check) 

    Parameters

    $bypass_token_check

    Set the parameter as required.

    is_required_parameter(string $parameter_name) : bool

    If required parameters are not part of the \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest object the OAUth check will fail and will throw an error

    Parameters

    $parameter_name

    string

    Returns

    bool

    Set the nonce callback

    nonce_handler(callback $callback_function) 

    Parameters

    $callback_function

    callback

    Remove parameters from the required parameters list.

    remove_required_parameter(string $parameter_name) 

    Use with caution.

    Parameters

    $parameter_name

    string

    Remove a signature method from this provider

    remove_signature_method(\Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthSignatureMethod $signature_method) 

    Parameters

    $signature_method

    \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthSignatureMethod

    Call this function before the check_oauth_request when you want to grant a request token Basically it disabled the token_handler check and force the oauth_callback parameter This unset the following required parameters: * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER and set the following ones * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CALLBACK It also sets is_request_token to true, i.e token_handler won't be called

    set_request_token_query() 

    Set the provider to accept OAuth query for access token This unset the following required parameters: * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_USERNAME_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_PASSWORD_KEY and set the following ones * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE_METHOD * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TIMESTAMP * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_NONCE * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER

    set_to_oauth_flow() 

    Set the provider to accept xAuth query for access token This unset the following required parameters: * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TOKEN * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_VERIFIER * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CALLBACK and set the following ones * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_USERNAME_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_PASSWORD_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::X_AUTH_MODE * * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_CONSUMER_KEY * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE_METHOD * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_SIGNATURE * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_TIMESTAMP * \Zeflasher\OAuth\OAuthRequest::OAUTH_NONCE

    set_to_xauth_flow()
